name: Snowboarding
overview: Snowboarding is a Sports game, developed by Atelier Double and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2000. Choose your character and make your way across one of the challenging courses at the world’s craziest resort in Snowboard Racer. You’ll need all your skills and concentration as you take the racing line through the flags, jump huge ramps, zigzag through pine trees and cut through the powder in a race to the finish. With two different modes on offer, it’s not always the quickest player that wins. You have to impress the judges with the coolest, most dangerous moves if you want to be a real champion.
